@tylerthedruid

You are a fucking idiot. Your statement is so flawed and unintelligible that dissecting this piece of trash would take more time than it deserves. A strong military is not an expression of intelligence or anything else you mentioned (impartial? professional? did you just randomly string some words together to sound cool?). If anything, a strong military connotes a fascist, imperialist republic which is obvious to anyone outside of that corrupt system. If you're looking for something that has the qualities of being poor and weak, look no further than the piece of shit between your ears. You were obviously educated in the usa. Do humanity a favour and blow your fucking head off, jump into a volcano or visit the local zoo and climb into the cage with the big kitties. Or at the very least, take a sharp pair of scissors and snip your balls off(although depriving your sister of her daily cumshot might be more than your prepared to do, you inbred). You give mammals (and druids for that matter) a bad name.
